website_summaries.verdict: This versatile braid spray works for many hair types.
pros: The lightweight spray can work on braids, or as a leave-in conditioner
In addition to a wonderful herbal smell, the Roots keeps hair well taken care of while braided
Once the extensions are removed, the moisturizing qualities become especially obvious

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I. love. this. stuff. Ok so I have hyperhidrosis (excessive sweating) and I tend to sweat a ton mostly on my head, like my forehead, scalp etc. and having protective styles in + sweat is not a good mix. I’ve tried so many other “braid sprays” and they don’t do anything except wet my hair. this stuff smells so damn good and it completely gets rid of ANY odor no matter how strong. it makes my hair super soft. I bought this expecting it to be like all the other sprays but I was wrong so I highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: This is life.
customer_reviews.text: This is life. I did braids for the first time and had the scalp itching of my life. I got this and it stopped all itching (I added a few drops of tea tree oil to it as well) and it moisturizes my hair, scalp and the braids really well. It smells great. It also it a bit sticky (the mist leaves residue on my counter top) but I think it helps keep my braids neat and doesn't let it frizz easily. I need another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea Ross

customer_reviews.title: Thank YOU!!
customer_reviews.text: Got braids in a month ago and have been going through so many different products to stop the itching and buildup but nothing sufficed. Received this bottle and washed my braids and sprayed it on immediately after and I have to say this stuff is awesome! Stops the irritation and leaves my scalp very moisturized without the nasty buildup that other moisturizers leave. Don’t know why I have never used anything but this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Had senegalese twists for 2 months and sprayed everyday twice a day. when i took the twists down my hair was SO soft and the dirt buildup that develops when you have braids and usually is difficult to break down/comb through was also soft. i took down 100+ twists by hand, using no water or conditioner to soften the build up. the spray is great and i will absolutely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cianne

customer_reviews.title: Great for protective styling.
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and keeps scalp moisturized. Adds shine and keeps frizz at bay a little. I used on my daughter type 3 hair and it has definitely kept the dandruff to a minimum while in braids. I have been using with my own protective style type 4 hair and keeps the itch away and flakes! I have not had to oil my scalp as much, will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Vie Jones

customer_reviews.title: YALL!
customer_reviews.text: I use this spray when in protective styling (braids and crochet ). And cousinnnn! Echoing what other reviewers said, you understand the full beauty of the product when you take your hair down - extremely moisturized and soft. For me, it eliminates the need to do a pretreatment after take down. Detangling and removing shed hair is a breeze when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for thicker texture natural hair - it’s basically water.
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice mist spray but it’s mostly water. The smell is fine but not amazing. I tried it for my daughter who is biracial and has really thick kinky hair... it just isn’t enough moisture that her hair needs. It was pointless for her but I use it as a leave in conditioner because I have thin Caucasian hair... My hair doesn’t need as much love as hers needs. Plus I didn’t want to waste it. I don’t recommend for natural hair 3c Or 4c. Just my thoughts!!😊 I won’t buy again. Hopefully it works for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect braid spray!
customer_reviews.text: I found the most perfect braid spray when I found this. I don't even really need to use this product daily and it moisturizes perfect without the nasty, gunky buildup of other braid sprays; and it smells awesome!
customer_reviews.author: SpeedmomSC

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and kept my hair nice while wearing braids. I disliked the stickiness of the product though. Left a not so nice film on my bathroom floor so spray it on carpet or something. I wish it were a bit more oily.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Bell

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling braid spray
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice braid spray. I was looking for an alternative after Dr. Miracle’s discontinued making their version and this is pretty comparable. It doesn’t have the tea tree oil which I love, but the smell and shine of the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not so great delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product before and loved it! I ordered my new bottle on Friday and it came sooner that promised, but apparently some of it spilled during shipping. When I got the bottle out of the package, the plastic was wet and once I remove the plastic and the product settled in the bottle a significant amount was spilled.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Please, use proper packaging when shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite hair spray. It is light, penetrating, moisturizing, and smells good. Unfortunately, when I received the package all of the product had leaked out due to poor packaging. I will be re-ordering soon since there isn’t another spray that works so well with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: KekaRoo

customer_reviews.title: Great...No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for my Ghanaian cornrows, the cold weather had made my scalp dry but with daily use my hair feels moisturised. Its light, I didn't feel like there was a buildup of product in my hair, can't wait to confirm that my edges are intact when I take it out.
customer_reviews.author: 2luu

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING on the scalp!!

One of the other benefits is how well it conditions your hair while in the protective style. I saturated my braids with this spray when I removed my braids as well and it kept my hair tangle free and easy to separate from the braids. Most people complain how synthetic hair drys your hair out, if you use this then there's no need to worry about this issue. I highly recommend this product!

product_meta.title: The Roots Naturelle Braid Sheen Braid Spray (1 Bottle -12 Fluid Ounces). Hair Moisturizer Enriched with Vitamins and Essential Oils
product_meta.description: The Roots Naturelle Braid Sheen and Leave In Conditioner softens hair and moisturizes the scalp. This unique formula is enriched with vitamins and essential oils. This pleasantly aromatic blend of Shea Butter, Tea Tree, Rosemary and Jojoba Oils with Aloe Vera penetrates quickly and deeply into the hair and scalp without heaviness. It will help alleviate itching, deliver outstanding highlight and sheen to dull, dry and lifeless hair. Braid Sheen and Leave in Conditioner With Shea Butter is anti frizz and anti itch conditioner that gives shine and moisturize your twists and locks. Directions: Hold 8-10” from head and spray directly onto braids and scalp. You will notice the instant shine as the braids look more lively. Apply 1-3 times daily or as desired. Ingredients include: Shea Butter Oil, Jojoba Oil, Aloe Vera Extract, Tea Tree Oil, Fragrance.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY Hair - Braid Sheen Spray and Leave in Conditioner acts as a hair moisturizer enriched with vitamins and essential oils
ENRICHED - Contains Natural Shea Butter, Tea Tree, Rosemary and Jojoba Oils with Aloe Vera
GREAT LOOK AND FEEL - Helps alleviate itching, deliver outstanding highlight and sheen to dull, dry and lifeless hair.
POPULAR - Use as a leave in conditioner and general braid spray. Works on all hair types including curly hair, long hair and short hair
UNIVERSAL - Best for women with all hair types including African American and Asian Hair
